languages.text: "Когда весть о вашем возвращении облетит миры фон Валанциус... о, массы будут ликовать! Никогда еще Простор не знал столь милосердного лидера, как вы! Пускай имперские фанатики шепчут о ересях умов, процветающих с вашего дозволения — ваша доброта навсегда покорила миллионы простых подданных".

"Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."
languages.original_text: "Когда весть о вашем возвращении облетит миры фон Валанциус... о, массы будут ликовать! Никогда еще Простор не знал столь милосердного лидера, как вы! Пускай имперские фанатики шепчут о ересях умов, процветающих с вашего дозволения — ваша доброта навсегда покорила миллионы простых подданных".

The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

"Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

languages.text: “等您归来的消息传遍冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地之后……哎呀，您的臣民一定会欣喜若狂！整个科罗努斯扩区从来没见过像您这么仁慈的领导人！帝国信条的狂热分子可能会窃窃私语，说在您的统治下，自由思想与异端邪说正在甚嚣尘上，但毫无疑问，您的仁慈赢得了亿万普通臣民的爱戴。”
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

traits.locale_text: “等您归来的消息传遍冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地之后……哎呀，您的臣民一定会欣喜若狂！整个科罗努斯扩区从来没见过像您这么仁慈的领导人！帝国信条的狂热分子可能会窃窃私语，说在您的统治下，自由思想与异端邪说正在甚嚣尘上，但毫无疑问，您的仁慈赢得了亿万普通臣民的爱戴。”

languages.text: "Sobald die Kunde von Eurer Rückkehr jede Valancius-Welt erreicht, werden die Massen in Ekstase verfallen! Die Ausdehnung hat noch nie einen so gnädigen Anführer wie Euch gekannt! Die Fanatiker des Glaubens mögen von der Ketzerei des Verstands wispern, der unter Eurer Herrschaft aufblüht, doch Euer guter Wille hat Millionen gewöhnlicher Untertanen für immer begeistert."
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Sobald die Kunde von Eurer Rückkehr jede Valancius-Welt erreicht, werden die Massen in Ekstase verfallen! Die Ausdehnung hat noch nie einen so gnädigen Anführer wie Euch gekannt! Die Fanatiker des Glaubens mögen von der Ketzerei des Verstands wispern, der unter Eurer Herrschaft aufblüht, doch Euer guter Wille hat Millionen gewöhnlicher Untertanen für immer begeistert."

languages.text: « Les peuples de tous les mondes de la dynastie von Valancius ne pourront que se réjouir d'apprendre votre retour. Jamais les Étendues n'ont connu {mf|un souverain|une souveraine} plus {mf|clément|clémente} ! Les fanatiques du Crédo peuvent bien dire ce qu'ils veulent sur la prétendue hérésie de l'esprit qui foisonnerait sous votre règne, mais votre bienveillance a à jamais conquis les âmes de millions de sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Les peuples de tous les mondes de la dynastie von Valancius ne pourront que se réjouir d'apprendre votre retour. Jamais les Étendues n'ont connu {mf|un souverain|une souveraine} plus {mf|clément|clémente} ! Les fanatiques du Crédo peuvent bien dire ce qu'ils veulent sur la prétendue hérésie de l'esprit qui foisonnerait sous votre règne, mais votre bienveillance a à jamais conquis les âmes de millions de sujets. »

languages.text: «Cuando la noticia de su regreso llegue a los mundos von Valancius... las masas estarán pletóricas! ¡La Extensión nunca ha tenido un{mf||a} gobernante tan misericordios{mf|o|a} como usted! Que los fanáticos del Credo digan lo que quieran sobre la proliferación de herejías mentales bajo su mandato, porque su benevolencia se ha ganado las almas de millones de súbditos corrientes».
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando la noticia de su regreso llegue a los mundos von Valancius... las masas estarán pletóricas! ¡La Extensión nunca ha tenido un{mf||a} gobernante tan misericordios{mf|o|a} como usted! Que los fanáticos del Credo digan lo que quieran sobre la proliferación de herejías mentales bajo su mandato, porque su benevolencia se ha ganado las almas de millones de súbditos corrientes».

languages.text: 「あなたの帰還の知らせがフォン・ヴァランシウス全土に届けば、大衆は大喜びするでしょう！エクスパンスには、あなたほど慈悲深い指導者はこれまでいませんでした。クリードの狂信者たちは、あなたの支配下で急成長する心の異端についてささやくかもしれませんが、あなたの博愛は何百万もの普通の臣民の魂を永遠に捕らえています」
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの帰還の知らせがフォン・ヴァランシウス全土に届けば、大衆は大喜びするでしょう！エクスパンスには、あなたほど慈悲深い指導者はこれまでいませんでした。クリードの狂信者たちは、あなたの支配下で急成長する心の異端についてささやくかもしれませんが、あなたの博愛は何百万もの普通の臣民の魂を永遠に捕らえています」

languages.text: "Von Valancius dünyalarının tamamı dönüşünüzü duyduğunda... Millet coşacak! Enginlik'te sizin kadar merhametli bir lider görülmemiştir! İtikat'ın fanatikleri, hükümdarlığınızda kâfirliğin yayıldığına dair vesveseler yaysa da avamınızdan milyonlarcası ihsanınıza gönül vermiş durumda."
languages.original_text: "Once word of your return reaches every von Valancius world... why, the masses will be ecstatic! Never before has the Expanse known a leader as merciful as you! The fanatics of the Creed may whisper about the heresies of the mind burgeoning under your rule, but your benevolence has forever captured the souls of millions of ordinary subjects."
